favourite.article: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord.
I want to be Your lover forever, Lord. I'm always attracted by Your love. Your love is my satisfaction, Lord. "OH LORD JESUS!"
I am a lover of Christ.
I like this song because it can really touch our hearts and especially to the Lord. We can really feel that we are the true lovers of Christ.
Wow!!! I love to hear this music... I love You Lord!!!
Oh Lord, Your name is sooo sweet to hear! With You I am at peace, satisfied. You are my only satisfaction.

Amen! Amen! Amen! OH! LORD JESUS! We should love and pursue more to gain more Christ. We must pay the price and be hungry and thirst for the hidden manna and the water of life flowing from the throne of God. Amen!

Lord, thank You so much for loving us. It is the love of Christ that constrains us, loves us and eventually makes us the same as You are in life and nature to become the corporate Shulammite, the duplication of Solomon (Christ). Thank You Lord that You are working out this daily in us to make us the lovers of Christ. PRAISE YOU LORD!!! Amen. Hallelujah!! "JESUS LORD, WE LOVE YOU!"
I just praise the Lord for preserving everyone of us in His love, grace and mercy...and we just love Him!

Amen. I really love this hymn. It so sweet to be called a lover of Christ. As His lover may we always love Him with our whole being and live always in His death, resurrection, and ascension. Hallelujah.
Oh how it's so sweet to be called a lover of Christ! HIS love is so wonderful, even to the point of saving us to the uttermost. I can't live without Him!!! I love Him! ^_^
We are called by CHRIST. Praise the LORD we are one with HIM. LORD JESUS we love You.
Oh Lord Jesus, we love You. We want to grow up in Your love. Amen, Hallelujah!
O Lord, we love You because You're our first love. We want to grow up in Your love!!! Amen, Hallelujah!
Lord Jesus, I love You!
This hymn encourages me to love the Lord more and to forever pursue Him.
Oh I love this song. The more I sing it the more Christ becomes sweeter to me. Let us be preserved by His love. Amen.

Praise the Lord that it is God who courted us and make us His lovers! He loves us for who we are and what we are. Day by day, moment by moment, as long as we turn to our spirit and enjoy His word, we will continually be attracted by Him, thus, causing us to love Him more... O Lord Jesus, I love You!
We love this hymn because it keeps our heart in the Lord.

Praise The LORD...!!!
for he loves us with His unconditional love...may the LORD reveal more of Himself in us and even constrain us more to love Him in return...
amen3x...!!!!

Praise the Lord for we are the lover of Christ...Whom have drawn by His sweetness and who's called by Him to live more strongly within..Christ is the All-inclusive One and our real satisfaction. So brothers and sisters we just pursue after Him. Amen....
Praise the Lord!!! lets all become A LOVER OF CHRIST.
..it always reminds me to pursue and gain the Lord more. He is so dear!!!!!!! For His testamony and His bride in Europe and allover the world.
Praise the Lord.We must be a lover of CHRIST AND THE CHURCH. We must enjoy and pursue Him for full satisfaction. I really enjoy the hymn.Ameeeeennnn!
Christ is our all inclusive one and our rest for full satisfaction.......hallelujah for His our everything.........

I really love this song because I am lover of Him, when I stay at home only me believe in Him so I can touch the real love, never leave me only, so it's sure that I'm a lover of Him. I really enjoy this song.

A LOVER OF CHRIST SHOULD BE ONE WHO ATTRACT BY HIS LOVE AND SWEETNESS.
Hallelujah! Saints we must enjoy this Christ as our real love one we must pursue after Him for our satisfaction. I enjoy this hymn as the very lover of the whole body of Christ. AMMEEENNNN!!!!!
I really like this song because I am a lover of Him,I always pursue Him and enjoy Him to the uttermost of my life. It make me encourage to love Hm more. O LORD JESUS! I LOVE YOU! Amen(",).
